name: Slice of Spinach Pizza
preparation: Roll puff pastry into a thin 10.5” (26 cm) square. Gently flip onto large side of an appy maker. Using a rolling pin, firmly roll over to cut pastry.
Gently remove each triangle from the appy maker and place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Spread 3 tbsp of dip on each triangle and sprinkle with feta.
Bake for 15 min or until the pastry is golden brown. Cool on a wire rack and enjoy!
tips: Fun for kids to add their own toppings for a personalized slice of pizza.

products.name: Spinach Dip Mix
summary: Punchy blend with onion & sweet bell pepper.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
